mapper.sql: appId, appSecret, accessToken, ticket, expiresIn, refreshTime, deadTime, appName, appType, sysId, status, remark, createTime
mapper.insert: insert into wechat_config (appId, appSecret, accessToken, ticket, expiresIn, refreshTime, deadTime, appName, appType, sysId, status, remark, createTime) values (#{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appSecret,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accessToken,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ticket,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expiresIn,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{refreshTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deadTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{appName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sysId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update wechat_config set appSecret = #{appSecret,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, accessToken = #{accessToken,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ticket = #{ticket,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, expiresIn = #{expiresIn,jdbcType=INTEGER}, refreshTime = #{refreshTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, deadTime = #{deadTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, appName = #{appName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, appType = #{appType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysId = #{sysId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createTime = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where appId = #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
